## ValidEnumTypeRuleOptions.requireOnExported property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Whether to require `@enumType` on all exported enums and string literal unions. - When true, missing `@enumType` tags on exported enums/unions will be reported - When false (default), only invalid usage is reported

**Signature:**

```typescript
requireOnExported?: boolean;
```
